com.satori.bots.framework

Interface BotContext


  • public interface BotContext
    This interface allows access to the bot's environment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.gson.JsonElement getCustomConfiguration()
      Returns bot and instance specific configuration passed with the instance creation request.
      java.lang.String getInstanceId() 
      static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class clazz)
      Using loggers retrieved via getLogger is the preferred method of logging inside the bot
      static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
      Using loggers retrieved via getLogger is the preferred method of logging inside the bot
      RtmProxy getRtmProxy() 
      StatsReporter getStatsReporter() 

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomConfiguration

        com.google.gson.JsonElement getCustomConfiguration()
        Returns bot and instance specific configuration passed with the instance creation request. The framework does not inspect this value
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the custom configuration

      • getRtmProxy

        RtmProxy getRtmProxy()
        Returns:
        A RtmProxy for this bot instance.

      • getStatsReporter

        StatsReporter getStatsReporter()
        Returns:
        A StatsReporter for this bot instance

      • getInstanceId

        java.lang.String getInstanceId()
        Returns:
        The instance ID of this bot

      • getLogger

        static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Using loggers retrieved via getLogger is the preferred method of logging inside the bot
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class after which to name the logger
        Returns:
        A logger printing into bot's user log

      • getLogger

        static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
        Using loggers retrieved via getLogger is the preferred method of logging inside the bot
        Parameters:
        name - Name for the logger
        Returns:
        A logger printing into bot's user log
